name: Fantasy Hockey Dashboard (WIP)
description: A visual and in-depth tool to track team performance in an ESPN Fantasy Hockey league.

name: XM-23 Emulator
description: A fully-featured emulator for the XM-23 RISC. Implements 40+ unique instructions, a read/write cache, and an interrupt handler.

name: Guess the Year
description: A game where you try to guess the year of certain historical events. Has a nostalgic Windows XP coat of paint.
